Ok, if i am hearing David correctly, he said "it is a paper clip or paper  =

tie" and he told me to let you know that He will not play this game with y=
ou 
 anymore.  I had another spirit lady say, "paper tie," or it sounded li=
ke  
something to hold paper's together, like staples, and one said "Bible"=
 at 
the  end, but I didn't get him on record because, I ran out just when =
he 
spoke.   One spirit even said, a tiny something or other.   So, you tak=
e your  
pick, Robert is it?   sf

P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,

aylight Time, 
rasterer@yahoo. com  writes:

 
Considering the attacks peop=
le continue to make  against me on here just 
for having a different opinio=
n of  people's results, I think you will 
understand why I will not  post m=
y name and address here.

Try anyway though.   I don't know how your person=
al beliefs here work, but 
others  seem to get messages about people they'v=
e never heard of, or  places 
they've never seen.

I would also suggest any=
one  who tries this experiment, to post your 
results on the list  here rat=
her than sending them personally to me - so I won't 
be  accused of losing =
any.

e:

 Experiment 20100710
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups  .com
Date: Saturday, July 10,=

What is your name RJ? and where do you live?   There are=
 probably tons of 
RJ's in this world, and if i am  going to ask any of my =
guides if they want 
to play this game  with you, I will not ask them to ru=
n around the world a  
lookin for you. sf
 
 
In a message dated 7/10/2010 =
3:32:51 P.M. Eastern  Daylight Time, 
rasterer@yahoo. com writes:

 

I hav=
e placed a little something on top of my  computer monitor, right in 
front=
 of me. It is now  7/10/2010. I will leave it there 4 days, and remove 
it =
 Noon Denver time, on Wednesday, 7/14/2010.

All you  have to do is ask you=
r boxes/spirits/ aliens/etc, what it  is.

I have taken a picture of it, an=
d posted it to  the files section here, so 
there is no way I can squirm  o=
ut of the results:

_http://tech. groups.yahoo.  com/group/ EVP-ITC/files/ =
RJ/RJ.20100710.  
1.zip_ (http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/=
RJ/RJ.20100710.1.zip) 

Please do not try to open the file before  noon Wed=
nesday. But feel free to 
download it to your  computer beforehand, so you =
can be sure I won't change 
it  during, or after, the test.

Answers anyone=
 reveals  after noon Wednesday don't count. Partial answers 
(like  just th=
e color, or shape, or some emotion vibe) don't  count. Just 
tell me what i=
t is.

Best of Luck. I  hope for this to be a regularly occurring experimen=
t, and  
I hope we all can learn from the results.
